projects.name: iHealth
projects.description: AI-powered platform for automated digital product audits and regulatory compliance. Evaluates performance, accessibility, security, and code quality using industry-standard tools, producing executive-ready reports aligned with DGA and enterprise governance requirements.
highlights: Performance, accessibility, security, and code quality evaluation
Executive-ready reports aligned with DGA and enterprise governance

projects.name: Quality Mate (QMate)
projects.description: AI-driven quality engineering platform designed to enhance software delivery standards. Integrates AI agents into quality workflows to accelerate feedback cycles, improve consistency, and support engineering teams at scale.
highlights: Accelerated feedback cycles with AI agents

projects.name: Business AI
projects.description: Enterprise AI enablement platform focused on operationalizing AI across products. Supports AI agent orchestration, intelligent automation, and scalable integration aligned with business and regulatory needs.
highlights: AI agent orchestration and intelligent automation
Scalable integration aligned with business needs

projects.name: Developer Onboarding Platform
projects.description: Internal platform created to standardize and accelerate developer onboarding. Centralizes tools, standards, documentation, and best practices to improve productivity and reduce ramp-up time across engineering teams.
highlights: Improved productivity and reduced ramp-up time

projects.name: Saber Vehicles
projects.description: Digital platform enabling consumers to import vehicles into Saudi Arabia, including VIN-based validation and regulatory compliance workflows.
highlights: Vehicle import platform with VIN-based validation

projects.name: Halal Certification Platform
projects.description: Enterprise system for issuing and managing Halal certificates and official Halal marks, supporting regulatory compliance and audit processes.

projects.name: SFDA Faseh
projects.description: Regulatory platform enabling importers to request product clearance, select conformity bodies, and receive risk-based inspection recommendations under SFDA governance.

projects.name: Maneh
projects.description: AI-assisted certification platform under SFDA supervision. Supports manufacturers and suppliers in obtaining product compliance certificates across energy efficiency, quality marks, and conformity standards through a full end-to-end digital journey.
highlights: Energy efficiency and quality marks support

projects.name: MOC Abdea
projects.description: Cultural licensing platform empowering practitioners and creatives to obtain cultural licenses, supporting the growth of Saudi Arabia's cultural sector.

projects.name: Dayyaf
projects.description: Property Management System enabling investors to license, manage, and promote rental units through compliant, digital workflows.

projects.name: E-Mazad
projects.description: National electronic auction platform facilitating secure asset and product auctions in compliance with Saudi regulations, improving transparency and market fairness.

projects.name: Wathq
projects.description: Government data integration platform providing secure electronic access to national data, enabling digital transformation and reducing operational overhead.
highlights: Secure electronic access to national data

projects.name: Muse
projects.description: Internal product documentation and file management solution. Provides structured product profiles covering scope, risks, milestones, deliverables, and stakeholder alignment.
highlights: Scope, risks, milestones, and deliverables tracking

projects.name: NCFB (National Center for Family Businesses)
projects.description: Platform designed to support and develop family-owned enterprises, enhancing competitiveness and contribution to Saudi Arabia's GDP.

projects.name: Franchise Center Platform
projects.description: National platform established under the General Authority for SMEs to regulate, promote, and educate stakeholders on commercial franchising activities.
highlights: Regulation and promotion of commercial franchising

projects.name: Maroof
projects.description: E-commerce trust and reputation platform developed with the Saudi Ministry of Commerce to enhance buyer–seller transparency and increase the success rate of online businesses.
